name: Clues Seeker
description:
The story about this game is funny XD

I made it during the GBCompo 2021 GameJam and the time for delivery the game was almost finishing.

So, i was in a extreme hurry, there was just 30 minutes remaining.

And...

I posted the game AS A PRIVATE DRAFT

So, i hope you enjoy. It's not finished as i would like, but is playable.
